title: I NEED 6 RP PLEASE
body: I NEED 6 RP TO BUT A KYE PLEASE ROIT I HAVE SPENT TOO MUCH MONEY ON RP MY NAME IS LORD RUTVEN ON EUNE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE

replies.body:
WE MAY BE ABLE TO WORK SOMETHING OUT IF YOU REACH OUT IN A [SUPPORT TICKET.
](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

LET ME KNOW IF YOU HAVE ANY ISSUES SUBMITTING THAT TICKET.

P.S. SORRY FOR THE YELLING.
